content.json:
## Workbook for java clientcore HTTP stress tests.

Select the run from the following list.

parameters.name: runId
parameters.label: Pod name
parameters.query:
dependencies
| where timestamp >= {timeRange:start} and timestamp <= {timeRange:end}
| where cloud_RoleName startswith "java-clientcore-http" and name == "before run"
| extend runId = tostring(split(cloud_RoleName, "-")[2])
| summarize start=min(timestamp) by runId, pod = tostring(customDimensions["hostname"])
| order by start desc
| project runId, pod

content.title: Test summary

content.query:
let runs = customMetrics 
| where timestamp >= {timeRange:start} and timestamp <= {timeRange:end}
| where cloud_RoleName startswith "java-clientcore-http" 
| extend runId = tostring(split(cloud_RoleName, "-")[2])
| summarize start=min(timestamp), end=max(timestamp) by runId
| project start, duration= end-start, runId;
let runSpans = dependencies
| where timestamp >= {timeRange:start} and timestamp <= {timeRange:end}
| where cloud_RoleName startswith "java-clientcore-http"  and name == "before run"
| extend runId = tostring(split(cloud_RoleName, "-")[2])
| distinct runId, pod=tostring(customDimensions["hostname"]), client=strcat(tostring(customDimensions["httpClientPackage"]), ":", tostring(customDimensions["httpClientPackageVersion"]));
runs 
| join kind = innerunique runSpans on runId
| order by start desc
| project-away runId1
content.title: Runs in {timeRange:label}

content.query:
customMetrics
| where timestamp >= {timeRange:start} and timestamp <= {timeRange:end}
| where name == "test.run.duration" and cloud_RoleName startswith "java-clientcore-http" and cloud_RoleName endswith "{runId}"
| where customDimensions["error.type"] == ""
| summarize successful_runs=sum(valueCount) by bin(timestamp, 1m)
| render timechart
content.title: Test run success rate (per minute)

content.query:
customMetrics
| where timestamp >= {timeRange:start} and timestamp <= {timeRange:end}
| where name == "test.run.duration"
| where cloud_RoleName startswith "java-clientcore-http" and cloud_RoleName endswith "{runId}"
| where customDimensions["error.type"] == ""
| summarize avg_duration = avg(valueSum/valueCount) * 1000 by bin(timestamp, 1m)
| render timechart
content.title: Duration of successfull operation (ms)

content.query:
customMetrics
| where timestamp >= {timeRange:start} and timestamp <= {timeRange:end}
| where cloud_RoleName startswith "java-clientcore-http" and cloud_RoleName endswith "{runId}"
| where name == "test.run.duration"
| extend status = tostring(customDimensions["error.type"])
| where status != ""
| summarize test_errors = sum(valueCount) by status, bin(timestamp, 1m)
| render linechart
content.title: Error rate (per minute)

content.query:
customMetrics
| where timestamp >= {timeRange:start} and timestamp <= {timeRange:end}
| where cloud_RoleName startswith "java-clientcore-http" and cloud_RoleName endswith "{runId}"
| where name == "jvm.memory.used" and customDimensions["jvm.memory.type"]=="heap"
| summarize heap_memory_used=sum(valueSum/valueCount) by bin(timestamp, 1m)
| render areachart
content.title: Heap memory used (MB)

content.query:
customMetrics
| where timestamp >= {timeRange:start} and timestamp <= {timeRange:end}
| where cloud_RoleName startswith "java-clientcore-http" and cloud_RoleName endswith "{runId}"
| where name == "jvm.cpu.recent_utilization"
| summarize cpu_time_percent=avg(value) * 100 by bin(timestamp, 1m)
| render timechart
content.title: CPU %

content.query:
customMetrics
| where timestamp >= {timeRange:start} and timestamp <= {timeRange:end}
| where cloud_RoleName startswith "java-clientcore-http" and cloud_RoleName endswith "{runId}"
| where name == "jvm.thread.count"
| summarize max_thread_count=max(valueMax) by bin(timestamp, 1m)
| render timechart
content.title: Thread count

content.query:
customMetrics
| where timestamp >= {timeRange:start} and timestamp <= {timeRange:end}
| where cloud_RoleName startswith "java-clientcore-http" and cloud_RoleName endswith "{runId}"
| where name == "jvm.gc.duration" 
| extend gc_type=tostring(customDimensions["jvm.gc.name"])
| summarize gc_percentage=sum(valueSum) / 60 * 100 by gc_type, bin(timestamp, 1m)
| render timechart
content.title: % of time spent in GC

content.query:
traces 
| union exceptions
| where timestamp >= {timeRange:start} and timestamp <= {timeRange:end}
| where cloud_RoleName startswith "java-clientcore-http" and cloud_RoleName endswith "{runId}" and severityLevel > 1
| extend category = tostring(customDimensions["LoggerName"])
| extend logOrExceptionMessage = coalesce(message, outerMessage) 
| extend message = case(logOrExceptionMessage startswith "{\"az.sdk.message", azSdkContext=parse_json(logOrExceptionMessage)["az.sdk.message"], substring(logOrExceptionMessage, 0, 48))
| project timestamp, category, message, severity = case(severityLevel == 2, "Warning", severityLevel == 3, "Error", severityLevel == 1, "Info", "")
| summarize occurences = count() by severity, category, message
| order by occurences desc
content.title: Warnings and errors in logs (sampled, 0.001%)

content.query:
traces 
| union exceptions
| where timestamp >= {timeRange:start} and timestamp <= {timeRange:end}
| where cloud_RoleName startswith "java-clientcore-http" and cloud_RoleName endswith "{runId}" and severityLevel > 1
| extend severity = case(severityLevel == 2, "Warning", severityLevel == 3, "Error", "")
| summarize warnings = countif(severityLevel==2), errors = countif(severityLevel==3) by bin(timestamp, 1m)
| render timechart
content.title: Errors and warnings in logs (sampled, 0.001%) over time
